guild.description:
Ask and answer questions.

Rules:

🤔 Posts must be questions. This is a community dedicated to Q&A discussion, so post titles must be in the form of a question.

⁉️ No loaded questions.

📬 No spamming. Spamming comments or posts is not allowed.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

🥾 Breaking these rules will result in posts being kicked and possibly an exile.

📜 Follow Ruqqus ToS. This is a given.

author.bio: Conservative and no, I won't sit down and shut up.
author.bio_html: Conservative and no, I won't sit down and shut up.

body:
We vary so widely, we're all different sorts;
There's some into knitting, and some into sports,
And some like to kibbitz, and some like to cook,
And some give opinions, and others read books.
We're rhymers, and dreamers, and some are just nuts,
Some like to post pictures of pets, or their butts.
Whatever the passions or hobbies you're in,
There's always a guild that will give you a grin.
body_html:
We vary so widely, we're all different sorts;
There's some into knitting, and some into sports,
And some like to kibbitz, and some like to cook,
And some give opinions, and others read books.
We're rhymers, and dreamers, and some are just nuts,
Some like to post pictures of pets, or their butts.
Whatever the passions or hobbies you're in,
There's always a guild that will give you a grin.
